column5: be there in 45 mins

I will be at 1 or 2 of these forsure Dave's one of my favourite fisherman to watch and I like how if you email him he returns the email personaly. His laugh is awesome too nothing like that laugh to make you want to get out on the water.  Chris
Man Dave called me out because I was not cheering mostly because I was under the weather, it was kinda embarrassing, but I forgive him
Barrie tomorrow night, don't forget to bring a non-perishable  food item for the food bank.
I was not that hard on you. It could have been worse you could have been Bev the security person lol. I hope your feeling better
Very true lol.
But quite entertaining for the rest of us
Or the guy asking for the Dave's shirt.  Hope he likes the water bottle.

The guy that wanted free stuff was funny, next show I will crap right up front and be the loudest one  Everyone though seemed to have a good time.On another note its great that Dave is so in touch with his fans and gives back so much, its refreshing even if he gives you a hard time.

Hey Guys, Only one week until the Facts of Fishing LIVE Tour. I hope to see a bunch of you at these events. Please help us spread the word about it & we will see you there it will be a blast!   Monday, April 18th, 2011 – SARNIA  Imperial Theatre  168 N. Christina Street  PO Box 43  Sarnia, ON  www.imperialtheatre.net Tuesday, April 19th, 2011 – LONDON  London City Music Theatre  900 King Street  London, ON  www.londoncitymusictheatre.com  Wednesday, April 20th, 2011 – BARRIE  Georgian Theatre (formerly known as The Gryphon Theatre)  1 Georgian Drive  Barrie, ON  www.barrie.ca  Thursday, April 21st, 2011 – KITCHENER  Humanities Theatre (University of Waterloo)  200 University Avenue West  Kitchener, ON  www.theatrecentre.uwaterloo.ca  BRING A NON-PERISHABLE FOOD ITEM TO SUPPORT YOUR LOCAL FOOD BANK!
Can't wait!   At the very least stop in to say hi to me as I'll be at all four events!!!
Way to steel Dave's thunder Ryan!
Well Ryan is the star of the show, Geoff  Nothing will ever top that lunge to save Big Jim's rod  Edit...make that try and save
I should be able to make it to the Barrie one.
WOOHOO!!!! Uh, wait I don't see a Yellowknife date there.
Well it looks like I will me missing this round as I should be on a later shift that will suck I hope I can get out of it maybe Honda will cancel all loads LOL.
Do my best to get to the Barrie one.  Hey Ryan how about some wings after?
I'm in buddy for sure!  I think TJ and a bunch of the OFC gang will be on Barrie!
Why does all the fun stuff have to be so far away?????  I can't even get a Dave bobble head to feel like I'm part of the fun.
LOL...Dryden aint in the running either.
Oh ya Chris.Ryan grab Daves credit card while yer at it.
ill be there on Wed!!!

How about the west wing near my house?  Ardaugh/Ferndale.  Actually there are other places much closer to the college. There is one place by Eastwiew I think it is called Roosters that has huge wings.

Aye boys and girls!  I'm packin' my bags as I type this!!! It's as close as I'll ever get to traveling the road like a rockstar! haha I can't wait to see a bunch of OFC'ers out there at Facts of Fishing LIVE!  It's gonna be one heck a way to kick off easter weekend with the family!  Please don't hesitate to say hi to me! I love meeting OFNER's... even if it looks like I'm workin... the boss is a pretty easy going guy! haha   :thumbsup_anim:  Cudz - wings and such for sure - we'll figure it out as a group.... I'll have to pack some gear up and help out with some things so I'll likely be a little later showing up but I can't wait to kick it!  See you soon!  Ryan
London should be a good show had fun there last year!

Dude, we are practically neighbours if that West Wings is near your place.. It's about a block from me  I'm sure the guys would rather something in the north end though closer to the college.  Isn't there a place off of Duckworth? (First road on the right past the college?)  I swear there was a bar/grill or something like that down there.

I live 2 blocks from there bill. lol. I will find out for sure but there is one beside eastview which is just down grove.  Also Lockeroom near st.vincent and cundles beside the big cop shop st. joes area.  That is very close.
I'll be at the Sarnia and London shows taking some photos for Dave.  Feel free to say hi!

Photo Concept  Have Dave land a Sub or another article of his sponsors...pulling a fugi water proof camera outta the tank or some thing....just an idea... Have Fun ...Good Luck with the shoot..  Cheers
Start times for the shows? not shown on the OP
All shows start at 7pm.

Hey bud!  Show starts at 7 but if you want a decent seat I'd come by a bit early... Ppl started showing up at six last night in Sarnia....  Say hi to me - I'll be taking donations for the red shimano hats!
We'll be there tonight. I want a red shimano hat.
Sound Check in London!!!!    See You Soon!
